title: ISA, MIGA set up multi-donor trust fund to support solar projects
description: The Multilateral Investment Guarantee Agency (MIGA) and the International Solar Alliance (ISA) have launched a fund to support solar projects. The MIGA-ISA Solar Facility will offer concessional financing tools to improve project bankability and lower costs. Initially focusing on Sub-Saharan Africa, the facility aims to expand globally, mobilizing private capital for solar energy projects.
